summary:
CBBE / UNP / UNPB BBP / SeveNBase / TopModel / DreamGirl
She has her own great armor and weapon, both enchanted
Armor already bodyslided for all supported body types
She can turn invisible while sneaking - optional perk
descriptionHtml:
[center][right][/right][youtube]-MTffr_NVOU[/youtube][youtube]bRgp7K3qUG4[/youtube][youtube]yeNGOJ4JJ-g[/youtube][youtube]-CFp8ERViHY[/youtube]





[b][size=4]Sasha the Assassin
Standalone Follower[/size][/b]

[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2822/33036277284_f0a51a773d_z.jpg[/img]



[u][size=4][b]Information:
[/b][/size][/u]
Name: Sasha
Location: Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary
Voice: Sexy Female Sultry
Family: Sister of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80959/?]Luna[/url]
Race: Nord, but her mother was beatiful Redguard. She hates Saadia.
Age: Unknown
Body: CBBE / UNP / UNPB BBP / SeveNBase / TopModel / DreamGirl
Weight: 50
Level: 10-100, scalling
Class: Assassin, she uses 2x dagger
Armor: Nightshade Bodysuit, marked as [color=#ff0000]daedric[/color], upgradable but [color=#ff0000]not craftable[/color]
Marriable: Yes, but be carefull, she can be tough sometimes, she's Luna's sister
Essential: Yes, to your gameplay!
Her body supports HDT Vagina
Her face was made from a scratch from preset 1 Nord

[size=2][color=#ff0000](She's quite strong so I don't recommend you running around with her at low levels)[/color]

[/size]


[b][u][size=4]Perks:
[/size][/u][/b]
SavageStrike
HackAndSlash30
Bladesman30
CriticalShot30
DualFlurry50
LightFoot
CustomFit

Optional:
Stealth Perk



[b][u][size=4]Armor:
[/size][/u][/b]
[b][size=3]Sasha's Nightshade Bodysuit[/size][/b]
Enchantment: Resist Poison
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/4/3943/33808674271_ea07dc0a99_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits Erucci13)



[b][size=3]Sasha's Nightshade Gloves[/size][/b]
Enchantment: Backstab
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2880/33808674201_b50d27db61_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits Erucci13)



[b][size=3]Sasha's Nightshade Boots[/size][/b]
Enchantment: Muffle
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2834/33125948923_16c2b640d2_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits Erucci13)



[b][size=3]Sasha's Headband[/size][/b]
Enchantment: Fortify Archery
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2816/33125948603_04d45eab1d_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits nsk13)



[b][size=3]Sasha's Belt Choker[/size][/b]
Enchantment: Fortify Sneak
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/4/3937/33897945626_2a9d9ef89e_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits nsk13)


[b][u][size=4]Weapons:
[/size][/u][/b]
Sasha's Multilator x2
Enchant: Paralyze
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/3/2852/33808674591_73d497f9c3_z.jpg[/img]
(Credits faxivcm)
Compatibile with Dual Sheath Redux



[b][u][size=4]In plans:[/size][/u][/b]
Fully voiced custom dialogues
Storyline
Questline
Additional scripted features
Optional hairstyles



[b][u][size=4]Requirements for HDT:[/size][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE
[/url]HDT Physics

[size=4][b][u]Instalation:[/u][/b][/size]
1. Download main file, install as any other mod, MO recommended
1.6. Activate in your MO, NMM
1.6.1. Have fun!
2. Endorse!

[b][u]Alternative Instalation (if you don't want fomod all-body installer)[/u][/b]
1. Download and install Core Files (Optionals)
2. Download your favourite body (and armor) files (Misc)
3. Overwrite


[b][u][size=3]Uninstalation/Update:[/size][/u][/b]
1. Go to some interior without Sasha
2. Make a save and quit
3. Uninstall mod
4. Load the game


[size=3][b][u]Additional information:[/u][/b][/size]
Checked with AFT, MHIYH, SkyRe Reproccer, RDO
I don't see any incompatibilities
She should be compatible with any other follower overhaul mods.


[u][size=3][b]Translations:[/b][/size][/u]
German: [url=https://onedrive.live.com/?authkey=%21AMKCzPag97UYQSk&id=1E054DDD8CCB6A8A%212356&cid=1E054DDD8CCB6A8A]here[/url], thanks to TKHBMVP
Russian: [url=http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/kompanony/14336/46-1-0-17406]here[/url], thanks to KoVaLR


[color=#ff0000][b]If you finished DB questline you can download optional esp replacer that changes Sasha's starting location to Dead Man's Drink, Falkreath.[/b][/color]


[b][u][size=4]Recommended mods:
[/size][/u][/b][size=2] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72772/?]Nightshade Suit[/url] by [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1635908/?]Erucci13[/url][u][/u] - my favourite armor, I play with it each time I start new game[/size][/size]
[size=2][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4683/?]DaggerCraftPackage[/url] by[/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/115497/?]faxivcm[/url] - if you want to see more of that beautiful daggers she has[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19447/?]Sneak Tools[/url] by Borgut1337 - Amazing mod with many great arrows like rope, water, fire, oil and other great enchantements. Must-have.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url] by T3nd0 - the best mod in the world
[font=Verdana]Follower overhaul mods (AFT, EFF etc)
[/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO[/url] by terzaerian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul - RDO[/url] by cloudedtruth
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers[/url] by Volek 
Sexlab Defeat - great option to quick command and prepare for sneak attacks.


[size=3]
[/size][b][size=3][u][color=#ff0000]BIG THANKS TO:[/color][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1635908/?]Erucci13[/url][u][/u] for permission to use his great [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72772/?]Nightshade Suit[/url] as a default armor for Sasha
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/115497/?]faxivcm[/url] for granting one permission to use his assets from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4683/?]DaggerCraftPackage
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?]nsk13[/url] for permission to use his assets from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?]Merta Assassins Armor[/url]
[/size]

Thank you!
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/4/3932/34048971155_64017fd655_z.jpg[/img]
[/b]


[b][u][size=4]My permissions:[/size][/u][/b]
-Do not use her face in any of your mods without my permission
-Do not reupload my mod in any others sites
-If you want to make SSE conversion - you can, but first contact me please.

Thank you, great modders, you painted my life! <3
